jobDescription: Job Description: Basic knowledge of the drug discovery process and independence in experimental/assay design, data analysis and problem solving. Working knowledge and experience with a wide range of technical skills relevant to the specific biology field. Experience meeting project goals and timelines. Good analytical and communication skills are essential to document and interpret experimental data and write reports. Experience working in a collaborative team environment is also desirable. BS or MS Degree in Biology, Biochemistry, Pharmacology or related field. BS with 5+ years experience or MS with 0-2 years experience required.
